key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on global organic and non-GMO suppliers
Regulatory and compliance risks in a highly regulated industry
Financial performance volatility with inconsistent profitability
Intense market competition in the plant-based and organic food sectors
controversies: Potential non-compliance with evolving organic certification and food safety regulations
environmental_issues: Dependence on suppliers adhering to strict environmental standards
Need to maintain sustainability initiatives to reduce waste, water usage, and greenhouse gas emissions
social_issues: Pressure to innovate and maintain market share in a competitive industry
governance_issues: Leadership changes, including a new CEO, to drive growth
Strategic investments in new processing facilities and technology upgrades
